This is the mobile development final project assignment.
It is an app that allows the user to save his/her favorite places in a map and visualize them in a list. The following features are covered in this app:

 ‣ Google map with markers and custom info window.
 ‣ Custom launcher icon
 ‣ Build in Android 5.0 Lollipop
 ‣ Image load with Glide
 ‣ Data persistence with Room API
 ‣ View of items in a recycler view
 ‣ Toolbar menu for fragment navigation
